Posts.Content: Aug 23, 2017 10:42PM georgiapeddie wrote: Happy to know it's benign. I once had a lymph node of about 3.5cm too in my left armpit. Had ultrasound and biopsy and was very worried. However, it turned out to be Cat Scratch Disease (a disease caused when your skin is scratched by an infected cat - I had never heard of it until then) and I had a minor surgery to remove the node.
Posts.Title: 3.5cm lymph node found by US in axillary area beahm3 beahm3
